title: I'd like to thank whoever reworked poppy
body:
I love whoever remade poppy, because every since I came back I played her non stop fell in love and now she's my most played champion and I'm number one for playing poppy the most in the world.{{champion:78}}

[](http://www.lolskill.net/champion/poppy/toplistGames)

replies.body: Her design was done by SolCrushed. He is currently working on the Yorick VGU. Hope you end up enjoying that as much as Poppy. :)
Well, can SolCrushed give any info about the Yorick Rework? It would be much appreciated.
Can we hope that Yorick will be able to control ghouls or that cant happen due to engine limitations?

Every time I get reminded it refreshes my hype... I hope he'll make a post about what they're doing with him, kinda like those MYMU posts
{{summoner:31}}
She does a crap ton they're actually nerfing her next patch because she does so much damage without building much AD

I know it's not much, but poppy is my second most played champion of my group, and I'd like to think I'm pretty good at her.
http://imgur.com/FkTATx6
GP, poppy and sion. Are you god of reworks? :D

I'll be totally honest, 2 things I dislike about Poppy rework is:

1. Low damage Q. I know it being AOE, having 2x damage, but overall damage is so spread out that you just can't feel the power.

2. Riot shifting her from damage dealer to damage sponge

> [{quoted}](name=Saianna,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RTQbRiIb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-26T19:23:34.137+0000)
>
> I'll be totally honest, 2 things I dislike about Poppy rework is:
> 
> 1. Low damage Q. I know it being AOE, having 2x damage, but overall damage is so spread out that you just can't feel the power.
> 
> 2. Riot shifting her from damage dealer to damage sponge

Wth are you talking about? :D She"s doing insane dmg ,without any dmg items.Thats why she"s was nerfed like 2 times ,and she"s gonna be nerfed even more.

Old Poppys Q used to have instant, full damage.

New Poppys Q has damage divided in 2 parts. Also it doesn't have AP ratio (even as weak as 0,4)
idk, I feel her dmg is really quite high, though, that may be because I tend to go for a few defensive items mixed into even my tank builds.
I just dread her new voice. Sounds nothing like my used-to-be sassy girl.
A shame about what they did to her character, turning her into a generic kawaii desu blob for people to make their waifus. I actually really like her reworked kit.
I have always wanted to try Poppy, but I just can't get past her personality.  Her selection quote drives me up the wall. "Im just a derp with a hammer ^_^ *holds up spork* "
I had gotten lvl 5 mastery on Poppy before her rework, but still very much enjoy the new version of her.

my favorite rework was {{champion:76}}  rework.. it made her SOO much more fun it gave her a much better pre 6 and it added an insane amount of counterplay to her kit that she never had when she just when he stayed in human form throwing spear all day. now she actaully needs to pounce in in cougar form to get the kill instead of just killing people with spears alone.
Yeah must be fun to play broken champs.
